title: 3times reset my pixel 2 , google destroy, after the last update of android10 , destroy my phone
content: After the last update of android 9 to  10  , before 2-3 months , my cameras both not working also viber and other application , also the last 2updates of 10 not fixed but make it more bad , bugged facebook bugged messenger , helpme now . I have pay for that , i know you ar master u dont care , google desrtroy my google pixel 2, google no respect ,
